price: 27. "That my Lord (Allâh) has forgiven me, and made me of the honoured ones!"
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
